name: Me, Myself, I, and Them
description:
Me, Myself, I, and Them is a puzzle platformer where a (theoretically) infinite amount of clones chase you! 

The game is relatively short taking 1-20 mins to beat, or more idk I kinda just guessed the number right now and it's 1:00 am and I'm tired. 

If you want context as to what is going on in the game it's open to interpretation. Some say it's a bar of soap avoiding mess in the form of cosmic entropy. Others say it's a noodle just hopping around. I say we just took the Kirby approach and spruced up the placeholder art. Anyway, I hope you enjoy!
